# Python cache files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.pyo
*.pyd

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Environment files
.env
*.env
venv/
env/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# PyCharm / VS Code settings
.idea/
.vscode/

# Python compiled files
*.so
*.egg
*.egg-info/
dist/
build/

# Ignore images folder if you generate plots
images/
